title: Deployment Through the Azure Portal
description: Once the Azure Data Factory (ADF) artifacts are generated, the next step in the process is to deploy them. The recommended practice is to use the automated deployment process outlined in the PowerShell Deployment Guide. However, all assets are provided for a manual deployment via the Azure Portal.

frontMatter.title: Deployment Through the Azure Portal
frontMatter.summary: Guide to deploy artifacts generated in Azure Data Factory through the Azure portal
